name: Rootaissance
description:
Prototype created for Experimental Game Design class prompt "idle".

Controls: 

  • Moving the Camera: 
    • Arrow Keys (alternatively, scrolling the mouse wheel for vertical movement)
  • Jump to Origin Root
    • Page Up
  • Jump to Lowest Root in Root Network
    • Page Down
  • Selecting Clippers / Root Type to Purchase
    •  Left Mouse Click over Icon
  • Placing Roots
    • Left Mouse Click (must connect placed root with a pre-existing root): 
      •  Horizontal Roots and L-Roots: Can be placed on an empty space
      • T-Roots: Replaces a Vertical or Horizontal Root (depending on type of T-Root)
      • Cross (+) Roots: Can be placed on an empty space or can replace any existing root
  • Deselect Current Item
    • Right Mouse Click
  • Screenshotting
    • Shift
    • Screenshots will be stored in "EGD-Project-04_Data/Screenshots/"

CREDITS
